section.title: Read an existing pdf
section.para: iText allows to read existing pdf's and include them into your own pdf. The following example will create page 2 of the previous example and create a new document with this page.

Create a new Java project "de.vogella.itext.readpdf" with the package "de.vogella.itext.read". Create a folder "lib" and put the iText library (jar file) into this folder.
Add the jar to your classpath. Create the following class "ReadAndUsePdf.java".
